entry.title: How to debug tests maven test via Intellij Idea
entry.content:
Not always you can run tests via IDE. Sometimes configs are complected and it is much easier just to type

 $ mvn test

If you want to debug them, you can connect via remote.

  • run you test 
$ mvn test -Dmaven.surefire.debug

maven will prepare environment and will wait for remote connection

  • connect via Idea

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-d2GmgIvfhOQ/TxkmO-2ErvI/AAAAAAAAFz0/LduWaxnFOpk/w694-h592-no/Untitled.png">

  • start debug

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-Xe-YoYmMITg/Txkm1OSUWYI/AAAAAAAAFz8/LKBvgNDOAUM/w219-h53-no/run.png">

  • Now test will stop at your breakpoints. Profit!
